title: Downtown Stamford, CT - Shahs Halal Food
text: Trying to find a halal eatery in the heart of Stamford, CT? If so, the Shah’s Halal team is excited to open its doors to halal food lovers in your area with its brand-new restaurant following thriving locations in Norwalk, Albany, Huntington, Hicksville, Riverhead, Pittsburgh, and other cities. We offer the finest, most authentic, and most delicious halal cuisines in town at prices you’ll love. Shah’s Halal Food is dedicated to offering our clients absolutely delectable selections, such as our signature chicken, lamb, and fish gyros and platters over rice adorned with freshly sliced salads and a variety of complimentary toppings and sauces. We serve 100% authentic halal meals prepared with traditional recipes, farm-fresh ingredients, and homemade sauces in a hygienic setting to ensure you enjoy delightful, wholesome, and fresh meals. In addition, our exceptionally skilled chefs deliver all catering orders with the utmost care to ensure that the food served at your event meets the same high-quality standards as the restaurant’s regular menu. In addition to our stationary restaurant, our fleet of mobile food trucks and carts allows us to provide catering services for events of any size or genre. So, if you are planning to organize a party for a special occasion, school event, corporate event, sweet sixteen, or any other event, Shah’s Halal Food is one of the best possibilities. So, if you’re in the market for authentic and delicious halal catering, Shah’s Halal Food, located at 245 Main St, Downtown Stamford, CT 06901, is a great choice. You can order your favorite meals for delivery or carryout- Sunday through Thursday, from 10 A.M. to 12 A.M.; Friday and Saturday, from 10 A.M to 3 A.M.; by calling (203) 276-1778 or visiting our website. You can also drop us a mail atshahsdowntownstamford@gmail.com
